data.name: The Elm Game Demo
data.detailed_description:
The free demo version of The Elm Game: an abstract board game for two players - human or AI - that is easy to learn yet hard to master. This demo lacks the artful nature-themed backgrounds, cloud sync and achievements that the full version has, but is otherwise the same board game and fully playable.

What exactly is different?

  • No online multiplayer.
  • The randomly generated nature-themed backgrounds with the tree stump etc. are not included.
  • Saves are not synchronized with the Steam Cloud.
  • There are no trophies to achieve like in the full version.
  • You will see a banner in the top left corner telling you it is the demo version.

Other than that it's the same game.

data.short_description: The free demo version of The Elm Game: a abstract board game for two players - human or AI - that is easy to learn yet hard to master. This demo lacks the artful nature-themed backgrounds, cloud sync and achievements that the full version has, but is otherwise the same board game and fully playable.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (*) Prior versions have not been tested.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any up-to-date Linux
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
